text:
Football Radar | http://www.footballradar.com | London, UK | ONSITE

Football Radar is seeking skilled, motivated engineers to help us deliver the very best in football analysis.

We're looking for talented engineers who specialise Scala or JavaScript. We actively encourage a culture of innovation, where initiative is recognised and rewarded.

For more info or to apply:

* JavaScript Engineer (esp. React, RxJS and functional programming): https://www.footballradar.com/jobs/#op-14508-javascript-engi...

* Backend Engineer (Scala/PHP): https://www.footballradar.com/jobs/#op-20718-backend-softwar...
